amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 55, 56, 57, 58, 60, 61, 62, 68, 70, 74, 77, and 82 printed in House Report 114-571. See page D540 of the Congressional Record of May 18, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 55, 56, 57, 58, 60, 61, 62, 68, 70, 74, 77, and 82 printed in House Report 114-571.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A033) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
